items.typeLine: Divine Mana Flask of the Remedy
explicitMods: Grants Immunity to Poison for 9 seconds if used while Poisoned
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Trolltimber Spire
explicitMods: 148% increased Armour
+56 to maximum Life
15% increased Area of Effect for Skills used by Totems
0.5% of Damage dealt by your Totems is Leeched to you as Life
You and your Totems Regenerate 0.5% of Life per second for each Summoned Totem
flavourText: The problem with working fresh trolltimber:
by the time you've carved out one end,
the other has sprouted fresh roots!

socketedItems.secDescrText: Hits enemies, converting some of your physical damage to cold damage. If an enemy is frozen and is on less than one third life, they will shatter when hit by Glacial Hammer. If striking three times in a row, the third strike will freeze enemies more easily. Requires a Mace, Sceptre or Staff.
explicitMods: 100% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage
25% chance to Freeze enemies
Every third successive strike Freezes enemies as though dealing 380% more Damage
+0.2 metres to Melee Strike Range
28% increased Effect of Cold Ailments

items.name: Coward's Legacy
explicitMods: +19 to all Attributes
10% increased Movement Speed
50% increased Effect of Curses on you
You count as on Low Life while you are Cursed with Vulnerability

flavourText: Death is your most important duty.
Face it, or curse your bloodline for all eternity.

items.name: The Annihilating Light
implicitMods: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff
explicitMods: 60% reduced Elemental Resistances
Deal Triple Damage with Elemental Skills
flavourText: There is no force more destructive in the heavens
than the scintillating light of utter clarity.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses a single enemy, increasing the damage they take from projectiles, and making projectiles split when hitting them, to hit other targets around them. You can only have one Mark at a time.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies take 39% increased Damage from Projectile Hits
Projectiles which Hit Cursed Enemies Split towards 4 additional targets
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summons a Lightning Golem that grants you increased Attack and Cast speed.
